review: So far it is an excellent option. Replace red ring Xbox to watch Netflix and Hulu on my bedroom tv. No issues with setup at all. Easy install. Well worth me money.
author: Corey Weese

review: I'm in love with it! It's everything I expected!!

review: My kids love the fire stick!

review: I am very pleased that this device is far superior to similar rivals.  It includes links to apps that I did not expect and has yet to slow or buffer during viewing.
author: Constant Reader

review: Absolutely love the fire stick. I love being able to enjoy my favorite shows and movies.
